meanings.definition: Redness of the skin, typically caused by inflammation or infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor noticed the erythemas on the patient's cheeks.
meanings.sent2: After the sunburn, her skin showed erythemas that were painful to touch.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated erythemas made everyone laugh at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The fiery sunset painted the sky with erythemas, resembling a giant canvas.
meanings.sent5: The vivid erythemas on the map indicated areas of high pollution levels.
